name: Jubilee Inc
description: Provider of weekly digital videos intended to create a movement for human good. The company's videos convey the power of empathy for human good bridge people together and challenge conventional thinking, enabling customers to get motivated and create a positive impact in their lives.
one_liner: Provider of weekly digital videos intended to create a movement for human good. The company's videos convey the power of empathy for human good bridge people together and challenge conventional thinking, enabling customers to get motivated and create a positive impact in their lives.
